biotools.summary: A structure based multiple RNA aligner. This is a new algorithm that joins the pairwise RNA structure alignments performed by SARA with the multiple sequence T-Coffee framework. SARA-Coffee is part of the T-Coffee distribution.

bioschemas.name: SARA-Coffee
bioschemas.summary: A structure based multiple RNA aligner. This is a new algorithm that joins the pairwise RNA structure alignments performed by SARA with the multiple sequence T-Coffee framework. SARA-Coffee is part of the T-Coffee distribution.
